title: Why is everyone in this game so goddamn stubborn?
body:
Some of my games today and the past few days have just been a complete waste of time, if we're getting stomped across the entire map and the score is 19/3 or something at 18 minutes, we're down about 6 towers, all dragons, we have no map control, you'd think people would surrender. 
Oh but no, so because of these stubborn players I'm being forced to waste another fifteen minutes that usually consists of tower-hugging, getting dove, dying, not being able to go out of base because they've either got everywhere warded and you get gooned or they're lurking in your jungle. 
Even a game I had before where 3 of our team didn't connect till about 7 minutes-ish, every surrender was declined despite two of us being underleveled and underfarmed and just getting dived if we tried to come and catch up. Our top reconnected, died 6 times then disconnected again which was useful.
If it's ranked, I can understand why you wouldn't want to surrender, but if it's normals why drag it out and waste everyone's time on games that you have no chance of winning?

replies.body: I said in the post that I could understand in ranked, in norms it's beyond me.
if you are playing ranked, there is a point in not surrendering, did you know if you /ff in a ranked game, the overall lp you will lose is increased by around 5-10
I did my best to give up quitting.

Sounds like your a quitter.

YOUR GOTTA BAYLIEVE
